text: Viruses are important causes of lower respiratory tract infection ( LRTI ) in developing countries [ 1 ] [ 2 ] [ 3 ] . The most common cause of viral LRTI is RNA viruses : respiratory syncytial virus ( RSV ) , human parainfluenza virus ( PIV ) , influenza virus , and human metapneumovirus ( hMPV ) . Adenovirus is probably the only DNA virus that is a common cause of LRTI in children [ 2 ] .
